plot: Texas oil drillers unearth the Mask of Apuk, key to the most powerful and destructive weapon ever created - the Sword of Echtua.

When the Tennysons learn of oil drillers unearthing the Mask of Apuk, key to finding the Sword of Echtua (the Mayan god of war), a change comes over Grandpa Max, and they're off to retrieve it. Enoch and his Forever Knights are on the trail, too, and both parties, guided by the mask, end up at a Mayan temple in Mexico, wrestling for control of it.—statmanjeff
